pageContext.claim: “Melania and I were treated very nicely yesterday in Pittsburgh. The Office of the President was shown great respect on a very sad & solemn day. We were treated so warmly. Small protest was not seen by us, staged far away. The Fake News stories were just the opposite-Disgraceful!”
pageContext.analysis: There was nothing "fake" about the reporting on protests in Pittsburgh during Trump's visit. Trump may not have seen the demonstrations, but the Post reported at least 2,000 people attended.
